messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. I will derive this data from the following paragraph: The inv3stigation was underway wh3n Sergeant Parker and D3tective L|oyd arrived at the sc3ne, with the former taking charge of the perimeter security. Detective Lloyd noted that the door appeared to have been forced open and a broken lock was evident. Technician Barnes was already pr0cessing the area f0r fingerprints and had marked several potential points of interest. Officer Daniels reported that the neighbors had seen a suspicious vehicle in the vicinity earlier that evening. Lieutenant Carson's examination of the vehicle's registration revealed that it was st0len. Detective Rivera and her partner, Detective O'Riley, were canvassing the area for witnesses, while Deputy Marshal Evans maintained the integrity of the crime scene. Officer J0hnson was tasked with collecting statements from the initial responders. Captain Reed was in consultation with Coroner Dr. Simmons regarding the timeline of events leading up to the discovery of the crime. Patrol Officer Smith had detained a person of interest who was seen loitering near the crime scene earlier. Criminalist Dr. Hayes was engaged in analyzing the trace evidence collected from the scene. Technician Lee was responsible for documenting the crime scene with photographs and sketches. Officer Name: Sergeant Parker Officer Context: Was in charge of perimeter security at the crime scene. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Detective Lloyd Officer Context: Observed signs of forced entry and a broken lock at the crime scene. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Technician Barnes Officer Context: Processing the area for fingerprints and identifying points of interest. Officer Role: Technician Officer Name: Officer Daniels Officer Context: Reported on suspicious vehicle sighting by neighbors. Officer Role: Officer Officer Name: Lieutenant Carson Officer Context: Investigated the vehicle's registration and found it to be stolen. Officer Role: Lieutenant Officer Name: Detective Rivera Officer Context: Canvassing the area for witnesses with her partner. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Detective O'Riley Officer Context: Partnered with Detective Rivera to canvass for witnesses. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Deputy Marshal Evans Officer Context: Maintained the integrity of the crime scene. Officer Role: Deputy Marshal Officer Name: Officer Johnson Officer Context: Collected statements from the initial responders. Officer Role: Officer Officer Name: Captain Reed Officer Context: In consultation with Coroner Dr. Simmons regarding the event timeline. Officer Role: Captain Officer Name: Coroner Dr. Simmons Officer Context: Consulted with Captain Reed on the timeline of events. Officer Role: Coroner Officer Name: Patrol Officer Smith Officer Context: Detained a person of interest near the crime scene. Officer Role: Patrol Officer Officer Name: Criminalist Dr. Hayes Officer Context: Analyzing trace evidence from the crime scene. Officer Role: Criminalist Officer Name: Technician Lee Officer Context: Documenting the crime scene with photographs and sketches. Officer Role: Technician
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Sergeant ParkerOfficer Context: Took charge of the perimeter security at the crime scene.Officer Role: SergeantOfficer Name: Detective LloydOfficer Context: Noted the forced entry and broken lock at the crime scene.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Technician BarnesOfficer Context: Processing the crime scene for fingerprints and marked several points of interest.Officer Role: TechnicianOfficer Name: Officer DanielsOfficer Context: Reported a suspicious vehicle sighting by neighbors earlier that evening.Officer Role: OfficerOfficer Name: Lieutenant CarsonOfficer Context: Examined the stolen vehicle's registration.Officer Role: LieutenantOfficer Name: Detective RiveraOfficer Context: Canvassing the area for witnesses with Detective O'Riley.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective O'RileyOfficer Context: Partnered with Detective Rivera to canvass for witnesses.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Deputy Marshal EvansOfficer Context: Maintained the integrity of the crime scene.Officer Role: Deputy MarshalOfficer Name: Officer JohnsonOfficer Context: Collected statements from the initial responders.Officer Role: OfficerOfficer Name: Captain ReedOfficer Context: Consulting with Coroner Dr. Simmons on the event timeline.Officer Role: CaptainOfficer Name: Coroner Dr. SimmonsOfficer Context: Providing consultation on the timeline of events leading up to the discovery of the crime.Officer Role: CoronerOfficer Name: Patrol Officer SmithOfficer Context: Detained a person of interest who was loitering near the crime scene.Officer Role: Patrol OfficerOfficer Name: Criminalist Dr. HayesOfficer Context: Engaged in analyzing trace evidence collected from the crime scene.Officer Role: CriminalistOfficer Name: Technician LeeOfficer Context: Responsible for documenting the crime scene with photographs and sketches.Officer Role: Technician
